attributes.action: Put speed limit in place and  speed cameras in little crosby leading to formby
attributes.additional_details: I feel like there are many tragic accidents that have happened. The roads are not safe and people abuse them and misjudge speed all the time the visibility is not great either I feel like it would benefit a lot and would keep a lot more people safer in future. We have just lost a really good friend due to a bad accident and I feel like this would benefit the community aswell.
attributes.background: I would like speed cameras and for speed limit to be put in place in little crosby leading up to the formby bypass.

rejection.details:
Decisions about speed limits and cameras are a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons. As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
